# metill <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package is developed to make the maintenance of plot themes, databases etc. easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of metill from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("metill-is/metill")
```
